41130baf-4c04-4811-a40e-09366a9de684: Choose one type of {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}exotic weapon{/g}, such as the dueling sword or sai. You understand how to use that type of exotic weapon in combat, and can utilize any special tricks or qualities that exotic weapon might allow.
